About Me

Here are a few things...

BIO

I am an experienced educator and currently the 11th and 12th grade Head Math Teacher at Capital Prep Harbor Schools in Bridgeport CT. I have both a bachelors and masters degree in mathematics from Fairfield University and Ohio University, respectively.

I am currently at a transitional stage in my professional career and this portfolio is the start of great things to come in the future. I am in a Full Stack Software Developer Bootcamp at the University of Connecticut and eventually, my goal is to fully transition into a Software Developer. For more content about my professional experience, check out my resume

My reason for this shift is so that I can use some of my skills I have obtained to affect some change in this tech driven world. Also, I want to push the needle in inspiring our black and brown kids to start coding. I strongly feel that this skill is essential and that everyone should, at the very least, learn a little something about it.
